reviewText: Hello, Barnabas here. Thie Dark Shadows video cellection is an excellent  video collection, it's worth your time and worth your money. Take it from  me, I know this first hand. Good day / night, pleasent nightmares.

reviewText: Johnny Depp isn't Barnabas & Ben Cross isn't Barnabas. Many fans of this will argue it had been short-lived due to coverage of the gulf war or something. But no, it was obviously cancelled because the essence of Dark Shadows (the original) couldn't be recaptured & as such, ratings were considerably low. This was 12 episodes & 12 episodes too long. You don't monkey around with success. What was Dan Curtis thinking? I strongly recommend the original.

reviewText: Hello Dark Shadows fans. If you are a fan of vampires, dark gothic romance, ghosts, or all of the above, buy this video now! I first discovered the world of Dark Shadows through this great 1991 NBC  mini-series and I actually did tape it, but someone evil whose name shall  not be mentioned here, taped over my copies!This series is so fun and  exciting I can't say enough good about it. If you love the  horror/vampire/romance genre, you will love this. One caveat though, if you  were a die-hard purist fan of the old 60s-70s soap Dark Shadows you might  not like this re-vamped :) version.
